newsitem.title: INDONESIA: Croatian PM's Indonesia visit to focus on trade.
newsitem.headline: Croatian PM's Indonesia visit to focus on trade.

text.p: Croatian Prime Minister Zlatko Matesa arrived in Jakarta on Wednesday for a five-day official visit to discuss economic and trade ties with Indonesian President Suharto, a government minister said.
"The Prime Minister's visit will focus on the economic and trade relationship with Indonesia," State Secretary Murdiono told reporters.
"The potential to expand economic and trade relations between the two countries is big, the question is how to utilise that," he said.

Matesa is scheduled to hold official talks with Suharto on Thursday before visiting the factory of state-owned aicraft maker PT Industri Pesawat Terbang Nusantara (IPTN) and the resort island of Bali on Friday.
He is scheduled to fly to Kuala Lumpur on Sunday from Bali.
Indonesia opened diplomatic relations with Croatia in 1992.
